card.name: Shatterglade Patriarch
card.text:
If an effect causes your Quanta to exceed your Max Quanta, you can deal 1 damage to all enemy units.
Halberd in hand, he carved a path through the cursed forests of Brunell, desperate to reclaim the fallen cities of his ancestors.

When a friendly unit dies, give friendly units +1/+1 until the end of the turn.

card.name: Spellwright of Wonders
card.text:
When you play a support, instead of resolving its effect, you can exert: Summon a Scroll relic and attach that support to it. That Scroll relic has the following effect: - Sacrifice: Cast the attached support.

card.name: Body Control
